title: Handaxe +1
content:
different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

This axe's hooked blade is crafted to cleave flesh and bone.

Handaxe +1 Location & Where to Find

The Hollow. Also can be found inside a Mimic chest (X:-695 Y:375) at the Grymforge.

Dammon, The Hollow (Druid Grove).

Handaxe +1 Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 250 Gp. Weight: 0.9 Kg.
